titles: An account of the taking John Penruddock, Esq, Mr. Hugh Grove, and others, at Southmolton in the County of Devon, March 15. 1654. by Col. Unton Crokes troop of horse. : And the true state of the pretended articles of Mr. Penruddock, &c.
notes: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660.
